00014  * además de definir si el plugin requiere de validación remota o local (oauth)
00015  */
00016 class Plugins_Facebook_Auth extends Common_Auth
00017 {
00018     private $_data;
00019     private $_config;
00020 
00021     function __construct()
00022     {
00023         // Call the Model constructor
00024         parent::__construct();
00025 
00026         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00027         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('facebook', 'apikeys');
00028     }
00029 
00030     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00031      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#hasRemoteAuth()
00032      *
00033      */
00034     public function hasRemoteAuth()
00035     {
00036         return true;
00037     }
00038 
00039     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00040      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#remoteAuth()
00041      */
00042     public function remoteAuth()
00043     {
00044         $targetUrl = site_url('accounts/auth');
00045         redirect("https://www.facebook.com/dialog/oauth?client_id="
00046         .$this->_config["appId"]
00047         ."&redirect_uri=$targetUrl&scope=offline_access,read_stream,publish_stream");
00048     }
00049 
00050     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00051      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#setData($data)
00052      */
00053     public function setData($data)
00054     {
00055          $this->_data = $data;
00056     }
00057 
00058     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00059      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#getData()
00060      */
00061     public function getData()
00062     {
00063         return $this->_data;
00064     }
00065 
00066     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00067      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#validate()
00068      */
00069     public function validate()
00070     {
00071         if (!isset($this->_data["code"])) {
00072 
00073             return "Acceso denegado";
00074         }
00075 
00076         $this->_data = serialize($this->_data);
00077         return true;
00078     }
00079 }
